item.title: Black Mesa and HL2 Episodes
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Not quite. You need to install the Source SDK BASE 2007, which you can find in your Steam Library Tools tab. Also if you install BM, if the Base isn’t installed it should automatically do that for you when you run BM. The SDK Base is what’s used to play mods, whereas the SDK is for developing them. The mention of the SDK on HL2’s store page is a relic from before it was free to all Steam users.
